posts.post_content:
EDIT:  Father-in-law is officially retired.  No more boxes.....


Time for another wooden storage box from my father-in-law @ [URL="http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com"]dakotawoodcrafts.com[/URL]

In the past several years, he has sold dozens of boxes to Net54 members at a discount.  

His current project is for the raw card collectors out there - with the ability to hold graded cards too.  Holds about 40 SGC tall boy holders on their side.  Normal PSA/SGC holders can be stored on their sides or flat.  About 56 stacked in 4 rows of 14.

Designed to hold about 420 Ultra-Pro standard (3x4) top loaders.  Similar to the 'T206' boxes - just larger.  Made with solid oak.  Removable clear dividers.  Green felt inside and outside bottom.  Strong hinge.  Key lock.  Size is about 14" wide, 9.25" wide and 5.75" tall.

See pictures for some examples.

Price is set at $170 delivered.  Nearly $50 of that is shipping and professional packaging.  Please PM and will will pass along payment details and get your name on the list.  First production will include about 10 boxes.  PM with any questions.  

I will post this in a couple B/S/T sections at a time.

Other boxes available:

Tobacco (T card) box:
[URL="http://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=178354"]LINK TO POST[/URL]

Graded card box: 
[URL="http://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=1050932#post1050932"]LINK TO POST[/URL]



[url]https://net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=439744&stc=1&d=1612880849[/url]

[IMG]http://www.billripken.com/bucket/boxraw.jpg[/IMG]

Very nice!

I want this box for my SGC holders.  Can it hold them upright with the labels facing up?
hes also got an awesome Box made for graded cards, i bought one a few months back, real cool

Manny,

The pictures show how cards can be placed inside.  Again, this series of boxes is designed for (400+) raw card in top loaders.  Graded cards can fit (about 56 in all).  If you need more questions answered - please PM me.
Those that preordered should be getting confirmation of shipping early next week.  A few more remain from the presale.  They will be ready to ship the week of 3/25.  PM me for details.
A few remain.  Great feedback so far.  May have 1 or 2 'graded' boxes too.  PM for details.
I bought the t206 box about a year ago and am really happy with it.  Very well made, and has a real elegant look to it.

Mine just arrived today Jon and it looks incredible!  VERY well made and just the right touch.  Thank you and please tell your step father thank you, he does amazing work!

Guys if you're contemplating about buying one and haven't jumped on it yet, do it! You won't be disappointed.

Another happy customer ;)
Still a few remain. He asked me to lower the price a bit. PM with questions.
Sold another - PM for more information and orders.
2 remain.
Last one (one each of the 'graded' and 'raw' card boxes remain).

2/21/14: New Inventory just added. A few are ready to ship. Inventory includes 'Graded' boxes, 'Raw card' boxes and 'T206 - tobacco' boxes. Please refer to the first post for the latest info and PM if interested.
5/1:  All the different boxes are in stock and ready to ship.  Please PM first for the Net54 deals.
9/14 - inventory updated and more boxes are available.  PM to reserve.

Hey Jon 

I sent you a PM. 

Best,

Scott
A few sold this fall - a few remain until next spring.  PM if interested.

A fresh batch of 5 boxes are ready to ship.
PM if interested in the Net54 discount.

Other box styles available too.  See [url]http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com[/url] for pictures.

7/21 Update:  (from my father-in-law) More boxes in stock and ready to ship.  Custom box orders are also being accepted.  Please refer to the first post in this thread for pricing and details.  PM for more info.
10/21/15 - boxes are back in stock and ready to ship.  PM if interested in the Net54 discount.
4/3/2017:  A few of these remain.  Please refer to the first post for details. PM if interested.  Net54 discounts!
1/5/18:  bump for new inventory of all 3 box types.  See first post for details.
bump

Bump for new inventory.  Net54 discounts still apply.  Please see the first post for more details.  Holidays are coming - order early.  Special requests too!
[url]www.dakotawoodcrafts.com[/url]

New boxes are ready to be shipped.  Please see the first post for details.

Edit - apparently that website is down.  You can view his boxes on eBay:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/sch/dakotawoodcraft/m.html[/url]

Please refer to the first post for Net54 pricing etc.

Sale going on.  Contact Loren directly via his website:  [URL="http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com"]HERE[/URL]

Knock roughly $5-10 off the sale price on each box shown when you mention Net54.  Maybe $150?  Contact Loren.

2020 Holidays are here!  Boxes are in stock and ready to ship.

Contact Loren directly also: [url]dakotawoodcrafts@gmail.com[/url] and mention Net54 for the best pricing.

Mom never heard back when trying to contact via email so she gave me the cash for Xmas and I ordered myself.  Fingers crossed.  There is a fraud alert warning that pops up when trying to order saying the site is insecure and routing to a known fraud site.  No obvious ability to mention Net54.  Hoping for the best and counting on PayPal to bail me out if things go south.
Got a near instant confirmation from Loren that the box will go out Monday.  Looking forward to getting my first box.
I'll take a look at his website this week.  Thanks for the heads up.  If anyone has issues or simply just wants to pay directly thru PayPal - just email Loren first.  He'll reply the same day.
Great looking addition to house my collection.  I’m gonna need a couple more at least.  Next Xmas I suppose.  Took some pics.  Very pleased.

Glad you like it and very glad it arrived quickly.  I'm hearing packaging and shipping on these is running about $50 alone.

Prices on these are updated to $170 for Net54 members.

These are GREAT!!

[URL=http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=437640&d=]Attachment 437640[/URL]

[URL=http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=437641&d=]Attachment 437641[/URL]
Fantastic Picture!  Love the ungraded top loaders!  Glad you enjoy them!
Bump for a fresh supply.

A few in stock and ready to ship for the holidays!  PM if interested.  
Please see first post for pictures and links.

I bought three (3) "Raw Card" Boxes from Loren 10 years ago (March, 2013).

Never used.  Opened once.

All 3 for sale on eBay for $200 each (delivered) or to Net54 community for $175 delivered each.

Thanks.

Andy
